name: Great Ball
description: A Ball with a decent success rate.

name: Ultra Ball
description: A Ball with a high rate of success.

name: Master Ball
description: The best Ball. It never misses.

name: Lure Ball
description: A Ball for Pokemon hooked by a Rod.

name: Moon Ball
description: A Ball for Moon Stone evolvers.

name: Friend Ball
description: A Ball that makes Pokemon friendly.

name: Fast Ball
description: A Ball for catching fast Pokemon.

name: Heavy Ball
description: A Ball for catching heavy Pokemon.

name: Love Ball
description: A Ball for the opposite gender.

name: Repeat Ball
description: A Ball for Pokemon caught before.

name: Timer Ball
description: A Ball for late in a battle.

name: Net Ball
description: A Ball for Water or Bug Pokemon.

name: Luxury Ball
description: A cozy Ball to befriend Pokemon.

name: Heal Ball
description: A remedial Ball to heal Pokemon.

name: Quick Ball
description: A Ball for early in a battle.

name: Dusk Ball
description: A Ball for nighttime or caves.

name: Revive
description: Restores a fainted Pokemon to 1/2 HP.

name: Ether
description: Restores PP of one move by 10.

name: Max Ether
description: Fully restores PP of one move.

name: Elixir
description: Restores PP of all moves by 10.

name: Max Elixir
description: Fully restores the PP of one Pokemon.

name: HP Up
description: Raises the HP of one Pokemon.

name: Rare Candy
description: Raises level of a Pokemon by one.

name: PP Up
description: Raises max PP of a selected move.

name: PP Max
description: Maximizes PP of a selected move.

name: Lansat Berry
description: Ups critical hit ratio in a pinch.

name: Starf Berry
description: Ups a random stat in a pinch.

name: Jaboca Berry
description: Damages foe on a physical hit.

name: Rowap Berry
description: Damages foe on a special hit.

name: Kee Berry
description: Raises Defense on a physical hit.

name: MarangaBerry
description: Raises Sp.Def on a special hit.

name: Escape Rope
description: Use for escaping from caves, etc.

name: Poké Doll
description: Use to escape from a wild Pokemon.

name: Focus Sash
description: Endures one OHKO move at full HP.

name: Eviolite
description: Ups Def and Sp.Def of evolvers.

name: Assault Vest
description: Boosts Sp.Def, but bans status moves.

name: Throat Spray
description: Raises Sp.Atk on a sound move.

name: BlundrPolicy
description: Raises Speed when a move misses.

name: PunchinGlove
description: Powers punch moves with no contact.

name: Lucky Punch
description: Ups critical hit ratio of Chansey.

name: Armor Suit
description: A suit of armor for some Pokemon.

name: Choice Band
description: Boosts Attack, but allows one move.

name: Choice Scarf
description: Boosts Speed, but allows one move.

name: Choice Specs
description: Boosts Sp.Atk, but allows one move.

name: Macho Brace
description: Boosts stat gain, but lowers Speed.

name: Power Weight
description: Boosts HP gain, but lowers Speed.

name: Power Bracer
description: Ups Attack gain, but lowers Speed.

name: Power Belt
description: Ups Defense gain, but lowers Speed.

name: Power Lens
description: Ups Sp.Atk gain, but lowers Speed.

name: Power Band
description: Ups Sp.Def gain, but lowers Speed.

name: Power Anklet
description: Ups Speed gain, but lowers Speed.

name: Upgrade
description: A mysterious box made by Silph Co.

name: Dubious Disc
description: A transparent disc of unknown origin.

name: Protector
description: A protective item. Stiff and heavy.

name: Electirizer
description: A box packed with electric energy.

name: Magmarizer
description: A box packed with magma energy.

name: Oval Stone
description: A stone as round as a Pokemon Egg.

name: Odd Souvenir
description: An ornament from a far-away place.

name: Nugget
description: Made of pure gold. Sell high.

name: Big Nugget
description: Made of pure gold. Sell very high.

name: BalmMushroom
description: A rare mushroom. Sell very high.

name: Big Pearl
description: A big, beautiful pearl. Sell high.

name: Pearl String
description: Big, shiny pearls. Sell very high.

name: Star Piece
description: A hunk of red gem. Sell very high.

name: Brick Piece
description: A chunk of tile. Sell low.
